data.title: Birthday Trifecta was a hit!
data.text: We recently had a party at Lola's Brush to celebrate several birthdays. Mandy and Maggie went out of their way to make everyone (even the least artistically inclined among us) feel welcome and comfortable. I appreciated their time and attention to detail- all of which contributed to the success of the party.

data.title: Painting party
data.text: Great atmospheres for painting parties! Awesome teachers and always fun! It was totally worth the money and was a relaxing night out!

data.title: SO MUCH FUN!!
data.text: This is a great time no matter what it's for, fun with a group, first date ;), or just want to better your painting skills. Two big bonuses!! Great teachers, and it's a no judging zone because I promise you mine didn't look like what it should have. Have fun with it. Try it. It's well worth it!

data.title: Looking for something new and different?
data.text: Was invited by a friend to attend a Lola's Brush paint party at Guido's and I didn't know what to expect--but I did know I had no artistic talent!  What a great evening!  We enjoyed getting to know other "artists", great food, and cocktails.  We displayed our artwork like we did in grade school!  The pace and instruction by Maggie was excellent.  If you're looking for something new to try--sign up for a class!  Thanks for a lovely experience.

data.title: Wonderful Place to Visit
data.text: Lola's Brush is a beautiful art studio. I went to an art show there and really enjoyed it. There was beautiful art on the walls, all from local artists and the artists were even there that I could talk with them. The owners are so nice and fun to talk to! If you're visiting Champaign or looking for something fun to do, definitely check out Lola's Brush!!

data.title: Great Activity even for a non-artist
data.text: So to start, I do not consider myself to be an artist.  When my friends told me that they were going to the painting event, I was skeptical.  Boy was i wrong.  Mandy helped me to find my inner Picasso and I left the event with a smile and a great feeling.  We are lucky to have such a great space in Champaign!

data.title: Check this out in Champaign!
data.text: If you are visiting in Champaign and looking for something to do this Friday night, check out Lola's Brush painting parties.  I've been to one at Big Grove Tavern in downtown Champaign which was a blast!  I've also painted at Lola's Brush home site which is an art gallery downtown Champaign, Indigo Gallery on University Avenue.  The gallery is in the heart of downtown where you can also check out bars and restaurants near the gallery.

data.title: Painting And Wine Party
data.text: Mandy is a fantastic teacher! We had a blast and will definitely be booking her for more parties in the future. Thanks Mandy!!
